The work of a Navajo Code Talker was to aid communications during WWII by assigning key Navajo words to common military maneuvers.

I confided in him during one of the most challenging moments of my life. (2/4)

It’s hard to come to terms with the loss of such a bright light from this world. Blake Hounshell was a tenacious journalist, a truth-seeker, and a superb storyteller—but above all, Blake was a kind and gentle soul. (1/4)
